name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: This is a juicy update for you guys with lots of bigger changes. You guys patiently waited for Soul Summons to be the allies you always wanted, and you won't be disappointed. There are new Forsaken Pacts to discover, many skill and item improvements, and the usual slew of bug fixes. One of the updates i've been more excited to play and release; I hope you guys agree - have fun!

Along with the 0.9.9.8B Update, comes updates to some of our other custom programs also: D2RLaunch and The Vault. D2RLaunch has been updated to 2.4.2 to fix Vault updating and The Vault has been updated to 1.1.6 to fix many issues as well as update the item catalog. Please update both along with the mod files for best results. You may want to clear config data to re-generate the item catalog.
